title: Evaluate Module Self-Loading Strategy (32)
---
### Uncertainty exists regarding the optimality of the module self-loading strategy, potentially due to dependency injection complexities.

I'm not sure if this module self-loading strategy is a good decision or not. It's hard to determine what is optimal, possibly due to the complexities of dependency injection.
